title: STALKER 2 Studio Promises To Fix Game - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.21.24
description:
Try out the new Sonic the Hedgehog game today! Plan your visit at www.topgolf.com 

Go to http://auraframes.com and use code KINDAFUNNY to get $45 off Aura’s best-selling Carver Mat frames.

Go to https://kindafunny.shop/ to get our hottest merch before it goes away FOREVER!

Stalker 2 launches big on Steam and is getting big fixes, Steam has made a big update to its Season Pass policy, and Metaphor: ReFantazio is huge for Atlus & Sega.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST - Our Avowed preview
 - Coming up later today, Mike and Nick will be heading into the beautiful, apocalyptic, and extremely muddy wilderness of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2 to face off against mutated beasts and bounty hunters. And in order to experience this game’s best performance possible on PC, we’re teaming up with our friends at NVIDIA GeForce. We’ll be going “RTX On” with Kinda Funny’s GeForce 40-series GPUs, which gives us super-boosted performance with NVIDIA’s AI-powered DLSS technology. This is the best way to enjoy the game and yes, you – Kinda Funny viewers – get to reap the benefits! Don’t miss it!
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway
 - And you can get Gladiator in Review this afternoon, and tomorrow on YouTube and Podcast services.
